item.content:encoded:
Where do I download Cisco Packet Tracer 7.2.1?

 

Where do I download Cisco Packet Tracer 7.2.1 for Windows and Linux?

For students trained in CCNP and CCNA, the Cisco Packet Tracer is a tool developed by Cisco’s team for purposes for networking, switching, routing and the Internet. It helps to display your events clearly during network sessions.

It is a great tool for solving real-life network problems. It makes it easier for students to solve technical networking skills and apply them.

The latest version of Cisco Packet Tracer is 7.2.1. Cisco Packet Tracer is a free tool to download it but you must register with Netacad.

Or you can download offline Cisco Packet Tracer 7.2.1 for free on different sources on the Internet.

Where do I download Cisco Packet Tracer 7.2.1?

Here is the link: Download Cisco Packet Tracer 7.2

Cisco Packet Tracer System Requirements

Minimum

CPU: Intel Pentium 4, 2.53 GHz or equivalent
OS: Microsoft Windows 7, Microsoft Windows 8.1, Microsoft Windows 10 or Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
RAM: 2 GB
Storage: 1.4 GB of free disk space Display resolution: 1024 x 768 Language fonts supporting Unicode encoding (if viewing in languages other than English) Latest video card drivers and operating system updates

Recommended

CPU: Intel Pentium 4, 3.0 GHz or better
RAM: 4 GB Storage: 1.6 GB of free disk space Display resolution: 1920 x 1080
Sound card and speakers Internet connectivity (if using the Multiuser feature or tutorials)**

The post Where do I download Cisco Packet Tracer 7.2.1? appeared first on Cisco Packet Tracer.
